text:
Shanaya Kapoor's 19th Birthday Was All About Fam-Jam And The Coolest Designer Cake
Shanaya Kapoor's 19th Birthday Was All About Fam-Jam And The Coolest Designer Cake
Sanjay Kapoor and Maheep Kapoor's daughter Shanaya turned 19 and her birthday was a fam-jam affair.
From Daddy Sanjay Kapoor to her uncle Boney Kapoor and cousins Janhvi Kapoor, Khushi Kapoor, Anshula Kapoor, and Arjun Kapoor were spotted at a midnight family house-party that was organised for her 19th birthday.
Sharing a picture of her daughter, Sanjay wrote, "Happy birthday Shanaya. Always keep smiling like this, my love."
The highlight of the party was a special Starbucks themed cake for Shanaya. Have a look at the pictures and videos from the party.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.5 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
